title: Middle Sister NV Goodie Two Shoes Pinot Noir (California)
description: This medium-bodied wine has fresh fruity and lightly spicy aromas, with a lively texture due to reasonable acidity and tannins. Flavors do a good job of balancing raspberry and cherry with slightly oaky vanilla and nutmeg.

title: 2 Lads 2013 D. Cuvée Pinot Noir (Old Mission Peninsula)
description: The nose boasts ripe dark cherry and raspberry aromas, with a dash of spice for nuance. Light, smooth and juicy on the palate, cherry and blackberry flavors resound in this easygoing Pinot Noir.

title: Apriori 2014 Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
description: Light in color and body, this wine takes its delicacy seriously, holding back on the fruit and spice to feature woody, herbal characteristics and a slim body.

title: Argento 2014 Malbec (Mendoza)
description: Cherry and cassis aromas are bright and bring an animal note. An energetic palate hosts plum, berry and herbal flavors, while a forward-charging finish is fiery and leaves a palpable herbal aftertaste.

title: Bodega Calle 2012 Alberti Malbec (Luján de Cuyo)
description: Rustic smelling at first, this is showing a fair amount of animal and leather on the nose. In the mouth, this is wiry and pointed, with crisp acidity. Angular currant and red plum flavors finish clean and juicy.

title: Valle 2014 Sauvignon (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Cut grass, tomato vine and gooseberry aromas lift out of the glass. The thin, brisk palate offers grapefruit and pineapple alongside zesty acidity.

title: Campolargo NV Bruto Rosé Sparkling (Bairrada)
description: With flavors of ripe raspberries along with a tannic structure, this is a wine that shows both freshness and strong minerality. It has tangy orange flavors as well as intense acidity. The wine is ready to drink.

title: Cantina Produttori San Michele Appiano 2014 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)
description: Delicate aromas of orchard fruit and whiff of spring blossom lead the nose on this light, refreshing white. Reflecting the cool, wet vintage, the palate is rather lean but still offers pear, apple and a hint of mineral alongside a backbone of bracing acidity.

title: Cembra 2014 Classici Pinot Grigio (Trentino)
description: The nose opens with aromas of white spring flower and green Anjou pear. The lively, straightforward palate offers crunchy green apple and lime zest alongside vibrant acidity.

title: Boschendal NV Brut Sparkling (Western Cape)
description: Clean, bright and attractive, this bubbly offers refreshing notes of red apple, pear and just-dried sweet grass. There's a sharp, somewhat astringent texture to the palate, finishing tart and mouthwatering, with notes of currant and green plum.

title: Comelli 2014 Sauvignon (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Subtle aromas of tomato vine, chopped herb and gooseberry set the tone while the lean, direct palate offers white grapefruit, yellow bell pepper a saline note. Bracing acidity gives it a crisp finish.

title: Convento de Las Claras 2013  Ribera del Duero
description: Like many 2013 RDDs, this offers minimal cherry and plum aromas prior to a raw, tannic palate. Limited berry and plum flavors are piquant and short, while the finish is choppy. This shares a lot in common with cherry Kool-Aid.

title: Cooper Station 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
description: An aroma like waffles and maple syrup and bright fruit flavors that are almost sweet give this wine a big personality. Full bodied and moderately tannic, it should make a nice pairing with rich pastas and lamb chops.

title: Cupcake 2014 Chardonnay (Monterey County)
description: Sweet-leaning aromas of pineapple, ripe red apples and white lilies show on the nose of this bottling. The palate starts with nice texture of Meyer-lemon pith, then settles toward ripe pears and apples, with hints of coconut and pineapple flavors.

title: Dão Sul NV Encontro Brut Tinto Touriga Nacional (Vinho Espumante de Qualidade)
description: This is a red sparkling wine, pure Touriga Nacional but also shockingly acidic and dry. Plus it has tannins. It's well made for what it is and will certainly appeal to drinkers who like red sparkling wine.

title: Division 2014 Les Petits Fers Gamay Noir (Oregon)
description: Pretty cherry fruit shows some spicy highlights, along with hints of leather. The funky aromas will be more pleasing to some palates than others. You make the call.

title: Caminhos Cruzados 2014 Titular Colheita Branco White (Dão)
description: This is a fine blend of Malvasia and Bical giving fresh acidity that's rounded and filled out with spice, perfume and a creamy texture. It's already an attractive wine—bright and fruity. Drink now.

title: South Coast 2012 Big Rock Reserve Red (South Coast)
description: This Rhône-leaning kitchen-sink blend of Grenache, Petite Sirah, Mourvèdre, Alicante Bouschet, Syrah, Nebbiolo, Zinfandel, Touriga Nacional and Merlot shows red currant, blackberry and vanilla on the nose. The light-bodied palate combines blackberry with dirt and rock flavors, with slight tannins.

title: Willm 2011 Clos Gaensbroennel Kirchberg de Barr Grand Cru Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
description: Almost overripe richness of fleshy peach pervades nose and medium-sweet palate. There is a heady overtone of vanilla into the bargain. For those who like it rich and decadent.
designation: Clos Gaensbroennel Kirchberg de Barr Grand Cru

title: Three Fires 2012 Pinot Noir (Leelanau Peninsula)
description: Initial volatile notes blow off to reveal ripe red cherry, sweet sawdust, vanilla and cola notes. With 32 months in French oak, toasty flavors pervade on the light-bodied palate, while underneath all that, luscious cherry transitions to spicy raspberry.

title: Tiefenbrunner 2014 Pinot Grigio (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
description: Aromas of apple, citrus, hay and a whiff of medicinal herb carry over to rather lean palate along with a note of bitter almond. Racy acidity gives it a brisk finish.

title: La Capra Presented by Fairview 2013 Pinotage (Coastal Region)
description: Jammy blackberry and plum fruits are upfront on the bouquet, with background hints of bramble, baking spice, cured meat and sweet oak. Medium acidity and lightly structured tannins lend an appealing texture to the mouthfeel, with hickory-smoked bacon and peppered black-fruit preserve flavors hanging on to the finish. Drink now.

title: La Tunella 2014 Sauvignon (Friuli Colli Orientali)
description: Hay, papaya and tomato vine aromas lift out of the glass. On the thin palate, you can find notes of grapefruit, mineral and a hint orange peel alongside bracing acidity.

title: La Vis 2014 Simboli Pinot Grigio (Trentino)
description: Bright and refreshing, this easygoing white offers delicate aromas and flavors of white spring flower, Granny Smith apple and citrus. Racy acidity gives it a crisp finish.

title: Larchago 2014 Tinto Joven  (Rioja)
description: Minerally plum and raspberry aromas come with latex and Band-Aid notes. This feels tannic, loud and high in acidity. Rubber and iodine flavors come in front of plum and raspberry fruit, while the finish is juicy and fresh, but drawing.

title: Previous 2013 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
description: On the borderline of exuding overripe fruit aromas and flavors, this wine reins it in to reveal juicy blackberry and raspberry around firm, sizable tannins.

title: Quinta do Casal Branco 2014 Red (Tejo)
description: This is a soft fruity wine with stalky blackberry fruits. Like many wines from the Tejo region it has a light structure that is built around easygoing fruitiness. Drink now.

title: Schäfer 2014 Mettenheimer Trocken Dornfelder (Rheinhessen)
description: The nose of this dry-style Dornfelder wafts of fresh green herbs and violets, but the palate is plump, almost ruddy, bursting with cherry and berry flavors. Plush acidity is augmented by a fringe of fine tannins, but overall it's an easy, everyday red for youthful consumption.

title: Wines & Winemakers 2015 Companhia das Lezírias Tyto Alba Vinhas Protegidas White (Tejo)
description: The wine is fresh, aromatic and so crisp. Made from Fernão Pires and Verdelho, it is ripe with apple flavors and tangy with orange zest. The wine is young, fruity and ready to drink.
designation: Companhia das Lezírias Tyto Alba Vinhas Protegidas

title: Zolo 2015 Sustainably Farmed Estate Grown and Bottled Malbec (Mendoza)
description: Grapy aromas of black cherry introduce a tight, rubbery but fair palate. Ripe berry, black cherry and bitter chocolate flavors finish with a note of toasty oak but also fiery burn. Let this aggressive Malbec air out and it will show best.
designation: Sustainably Farmed Estate Grown and Bottled
